headline: Final Countdown: San Francisco Set to Host B2B’s Boldest Voices at Marketers Connect
summary: Join industry experts from Autodesk, Suki AI, and Onix at this high-impact B2B event hosted by Vereigen Media.AUSTIN, Texas, Aug. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Just one week away! San Francisco will be the epicenter of B2B marketing innovation as Marketers Connect lands at Hotel Zelos on August 14, 2025, from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM PDT. headline: DASH Q2 Benefits From Strong Marketplace GOV: Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: DoorDash's second-quarter results benefit from surging Marketplace GOV, record order frequency, and expanding ad revenues.

headline: Computer-aided Engineering (CAE) Market Surges to $19.96 billion by 2030 - Dominated by Ansys (US), Autodesk (US), Dassault Systèmes (France)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Computer-aided Engineering (CAE) Market is projected to grow from USD 12.28 billion in 2025 to USD 19.96 billion by 2030 at a CAGR of 10.2% during the forecast period. The growing shift toward cloud-based simulation is driving the market’s growth, as it offers greater scalability, cost-efficiency, and accessibility.
